banner_details:
This promotional banner showcases a high-energy tech product with a futuristic theme. It features a dark gradient background with abstract wave shapes and subtle geometric accents. At the center is a prominent product image (`product_image`), placed over a soft glowing circular backdrop. The top layer displays a bold headline (`tagline`) using a modern, tech-oriented font in white, followed by a striking subheading (`heading`) in cyan. To the right, a vibrant circular badge highlights a special discount (`price`) with prominent typography. Supporting specs are provided at the bottom (`description`), and a bright call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) invites the user to take action.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Navy Gradient: `#1a1a2e` → `#16213e`
- Purple Accent Gradient: `#4a47a3` → `#7209b7`
- Circle Highlight: `#4361ee` → `#3a0ca3`
- Discount Badge: `#f72585` → `#7209b7`
- Cyan Text: `#4cc9f0`
- White Text: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image exhibits a dynamic color palette dominated by shades of purple, black, neon green, and red, suited for a bold, high-performance tech advertisement. The background on screen features a vibrant purple gradient (#A9378F to #462066), creating visual depth while highlighting the motocross rider. The red "New Launch" tag (#D32F2F) instantly grabs attention. Neon green keyboard lights (#00FF99 to #ADFF2F) add a futuristic edge, complementing the NVIDIA green badge (#76B900). Black and dark gray laptop body (#2C2C2C) offers a sleek, professional base. White (#FFFFFF) text ensures high contrast and readability without clashing, unifying all colors into a cohesive tech aesthetic.
